Ghana's Independence Day

Ghana became an independent state on March 6, 1957, when Britain relinquished its control over the Gold Coast and Ashanti, the Northern Territories Protectorate, and British Togoland


![**Ghana Independence Day**](http://kuulpeeps.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/bigsix.png)

1. Ghanaians Finally gained their independence
2. Everybody in Ghana was happy
3. Kwame Nkrumah had triumphed 

* To commemorate the day, there was a universal eating of fufu
* People were all very happy that the situation had transpired
* Also Omotuo was eaten on that day
